stem: A common cause of 'birdnesting' in GMAW (MIG/MAG) wire feeders — :

choices.text: Incorrect drive-roll tension or liner size causing high drag

rationales.CHOICE-2: Poor feeding due to drag or excessive pressure can tangle the wire at the rolls.

choices.text: Use wind shields and adjust parameters, or postpone if excessive wind

rationales.CHOICE-2: Wind can strip защитного газа; use barriers or reschedule.

stem: Что often causes 'червоточин (worm tracks)' in FCAW (порошковая)-G deposits?

choices.text: Excessive напряжение/heat or surface contamination causing gas channels

rationales.CHOICE-2: Gas bubbles under the шлак can leave tracks когда напряжение/heat — high or surfaces — dirty.

stem: Что often causes 'червоточин' in FCAW (порошковая)-G welds?

choices.text: Perfect защитного газа and low напряжение

rationales.CHOICE-2: Gas channels under шлака due to heat/contamination leave tracks.
